    LoadScene(int, float, float, float, bool, bool)

    Method that adds or removes an outline from the given GameObject.

    Declaration
    public static void LoadScene(int index, float closingDuration = 1, float openingDuration = 1, float waitTime = 1, bool additive = false, bool toUnload = false)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    int index

    Scene of the index to be loaded.
    float closingDuration

    Duration of the fading in animation.
    float openingDuration

    Duration of the fading out animation.
    float waitTime

    Duration when the screen is fully faded.
    bool additive

    If the additive scene is loaded
    bool toUnload

    If the additive scene is unloaded.
